changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql:
IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID(), WORKFLOW_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, FILTER_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL
CONSTRAINT PK_FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW PRIMARY KEY (ID) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW
